title: HOUR 1 - Derek Carr, Kevin Durant, Browns, Tom Brady
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Derek Carr, Kevin Durant, Browns, Tom Brady
description:
Derek Carr doesn't get the respect he deserves even though he has overcome so much

Kevin Durant would be a good fit for the Celtics

The Browns plan on having Deshaun Watson start this Friday

Is Tom Brady committed to the Buccaneers? 

 

Guest: Ben Volin

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
